Keywords: Assassin , Guardians of the Galaxy , Minions of Thanos , Pirate , Robot
Real Name: Nebula
Special Powers
PRETTY VALUABLE LOOT YOU GOT HERE: When Heist Nebula hits, after resolutions unequip each hit opposing character. If the hit character wasn't equipped, generate a Loot light object adjacent to the hit character instead. // FREE: Remove an unheld Loot light object in your starting area from the game. If you do, gain 3 MISSION POINTS. // FREE: Remove an unequipped opposing equipment in your starting area from the game. If you do, gain 6 MISSION POINTS.
HEY CHA-CHA: Charge, Plasticity, Stealth.

Wish they had given her the Guardians TA and Ravagers keyword
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
Good idea, HtB... hadn't looked at that piece before. I was thinking of her with a Tommy Maximoff or two. Even without the Mission Points thing, or without opposing Equipment to heist, I think I can get 65 points of value out of this figure in Sealed. The Stealth-Plasticity combo is something to which a lot of the ranged pieces in this set seem susceptible. The hair's a little silly, but so was the episode. Poor Karen Gillan... she had to shave her head to play this character in live action, and then the animated version gets a wig.
May 5, 2022
Hellboy the Bellboy
She looks fun. I do look forward to seeing someone pull off a 1st turn 6 Mission point grab pairing her with Ferengi Salvage Crew.

Goop
The mission point heist thing is cute and all and i'm sure it gave all the developers a chuckle. Nobody is ever going to utilize that. Anyway, she does have decent stats and perplex, the ability to make opponent drop equip is most useful thing about her.
